Package org.apache.commons.math4.stat.correlation

Correlations/Covariance computations.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Covariance
    Computes covariances for pairs of arrays or columns of a matrix.
    CovarianceTest  
    KendallsCorrelation
    Implementation of Kendall's Tau-b rank correlation.
    KendallsCorrelationTest
    Test cases for Kendall's Tau rank correlation.
    PearsonsCorrelation
    Computes Pearson's product-moment correlation coefficients for pairs of arrays or columns of a matrix.
    PearsonsCorrelationTest  
    SpearmansCorrelation
    Spearman's rank correlation.
    SpearmansRankCorrelationTest
    Test cases for Spearman's rank correlation
    StorelessCovariance
    Covariance implementation that does not require input data to be stored in memory.
    StorelessCovarianceTest  

Package org.apache.commons.math4.stat.correlation Description

Correlations/Covariance computations.
